title: Easy Christmas cake
ingredients: ['225g (8 oz) margarine', '340g (12 oz) plain flour, sifted', '225g (8 oz) caster sugar', '1 teaspoon mixed spice', '110g (4 oz) glace cherries, halved', '110g (4 oz) mixed peel, finely chopped', '225g (8 oz) raisins', '225g (8 oz) currants', '225g (8 oz) sultanas', '110g (4 oz) blanched almonds, finely chopped', '4 eggs, beaten', 'full fat milk, as needed']
